body:
Comment 4: 
Oh, I see. The mistake is in Russ' "A Tour of Go" video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytEkHepK08c

Some options, on a scale of least to most effort:

Do nothing.
Acknowledge the mistake with a YouTube video annotation.
If you still have the source of the video, re-record the phrase or edit it out and
replace the video.
If you don't have the video source, download the video and cut that phrase out and
re-upload.
_Owner changed to @rsc._
